mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM Manufacture_Design WHERE Manufacture_no = #{Manufacture_no}
mapper.sql: Manufacture_no, Order_no_details, Staff_no_design, Deadline, Progress, Raw_materials_requirement, Products_requirement, Product_no, Workshop, Details
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM Manufacture_Design WHERE Product_no = #{Product_no} and to_days(Deadline) = to_days(#{Deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and flag=0
SELECT * FROM Manufacture_Design WHERE Product_no = #{Product_no} and to_days(Deadline) = to_days(#{Deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and flag=0

select
distinct
from Manufacture_Design
order by ${orderByClause}
select Manufacture_no from Manufacture_Design order by Manufacture_no desc limit 1
select count(*) from Manufacture_Design where flag=0

select
from Manufacture_Design where Manufacture_no = #{Manufacture_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0

select * from Manufacture_Design where Manufacture_no like '%${Manufacture_no}%' and Staff_no_design like '%${Staff_no_design}%' and Order_no_details like '%${Order_no_details}%' and Product_no like '%${Product_no}%' and Workshop like '%${Workshop}%'
select * from Manufacture_Design where Staff_no_design = #{Staff_no_design,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
select * from Manufacture_Design where Workshop = #{Workshop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
select * from Manufacture_Design where Order_no_details like '${part}%' and flag=0
select * from Manufacture_Design where Order_no_details = #{Order_no_details,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
mapper.insert: insert into Manufacture_Design (Manufacture_no, Order_no_details, Staff_no_design, Deadline, Progress, Raw_materials_requirement, Products_requirement, Product_no, Workshop, Details) values (#{Manufacture_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Order_no_details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Staff_no_design,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{Progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Raw_materials_requirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Products_requirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Product_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Workshop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Details,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
